# dplyr and Tidyverse

To access the datasets, help pages, and functions that we will use tonight, load the tidyverse by running this code:

```{r install tidyverse, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("stringr")
```

```{r load libraries, message=FALSE}
library("stringr")
```
